con:part.con:content: <definitions name="BankService" targetNamespace="http://example.com/bank" xmlns="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:tns="http://example.com/bank" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <types> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://example.com/bank"> <xsd:element name="login"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="username" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="password" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="loginResponse"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="success" type="xsd:boolean"/> <xsd:element name="sessionId" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="createPayment"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="sessionId" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="amount" type="xsd:double"/> <xsd:element name="orderId" type="xsd:int"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="createPaymentResponse"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="success" type="xsd:boolean"/> <xsd:element name="paymentId" type="xsd:int" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="completePayment"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="sessionId" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="paymentId" type="xsd:int"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="completePaymentResponse"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="success" type="xsd:boolean"/> <xsd:element name="token" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="verifyToken"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="sessionId" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="token" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="confirm"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="sessionId" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="paymentId" type="xsd:int"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="refund"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="sessionId" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="paymentId" type="xsd:int"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="logout"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="sessionId" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="successResponse"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="success" type="xsd:boolean"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:schema> </types> <message name="LoginRequest"> <part name="parameters" element="tns:login"/> </message> <message name="LoginResponse"> <part name="parameters" element="tns:loginResponse"/> </message> <message name="CreatePaymentRequest"> <part name="parameters" element="tns:createPayment"/> </message> <message name="CreatePaymentResponse"> <part name="parameters" element="tns:createPaymentResponse"/> </message> <message name="CompletePaymentRequest"> <part name="parameters" element="tns:completePayment"/> </message> <message name="CompletePaymentResponse"> <part name="parameters" element="tns:completePaymentResponse"/> </message> <message name="VerifyTokenRequest"> <part name="parameters" element="tns:verifyToken"/> </message> <message name="ConfirmRequest"> <part name="parameters" element="tns:confirm"/> </message> <message name="RefundRequest"> <part name="parameters" element="tns:refund"/> </message> <message name="LogoutRequest"> <part name="parameters" element="tns:logout"/> </message> <message name="SuccessResponse"> <part name="parameters" element="tns:successResponse"/> </message> <portType name="BankInterface"> <operation name="login"> <input message="tns:LoginRequest"/> <output message="tns:LoginResponse"/> </operation> <operation name="createPayment"> <input message="tns:CreatePaymentRequest"/> <output message="tns:CreatePaymentResponse"/> </operation> <operation name="completePayment"> <input message="tns:CompletePaymentRequest"/> <output message="tns:CompletePaymentResponse"/> </operation> <operation name="verifyToken"> <input message="tns:VerifyTokenRequest"/> <output message="tns:SuccessResponse"/> </operation> <operation name="confirm"> <input message="tns:ConfirmRequest"/> <output message="tns:SuccessResponse"/> </operation> <operation name="refund"> <input message="tns:RefundRequest"/> <output message="tns:SuccessResponse"/> </operation> <operation name="logout"> <input message="tns:LogoutRequest"/> <output message="tns:SuccessResponse"/> </operation> </portType> <binding name="BankBinding" type="tns:BankInterface"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <operation name="login"> <soap:operation soapAction="login"/> <input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </input> <output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </output> </operation> <operation name="createPayment"> <soap:operation soapAction="createPayment"/> <input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </input> <output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </output> </operation> <operation name="completePayment"> <soap:operation soapAction="completePayment"/> <input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </input> <output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </output> </operation> <operation name="verifyToken"> <soap:operation soapAction="verifyToken"/> <input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </input> <output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </output> </operation> <operation name="confirm"> <soap:operation soapAction="confirm"/> <input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </input> <output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </output> </operation> <operation name="refund"> <soap:operation soapAction="refund"/> <input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </input> <output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </output> </operation> <operation name="logout"> <soap:operation soapAction="logout"/> <input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </input> <output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </output> </operation> </binding> <service name="BankService"> <port name="Bank" binding="tns:BankBinding"> <soap:address location="http://localhost:8000"/> </port> </service> </definitions>
